Description: IxNetwork on AWS 2-VMone Standalone Test CloudFormation

VMOne1Eth1PrivateIpAddresses.default: VMOne1 Eth1 Private IP Address CSV List

VMOne2Eth1PrivateIpAddresses.default: VMOne2 Eth1 Private IP Address CSV List

UserEmailTag.Description: Email address tag of user creating the stack

UserLoginTag.Description: Login ID tag of user creating the stack

IxClientAmiAlias.Description: Ami Alias of Ixia Client VM

VpcCidrBlock.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
VpcCidrBlock.Description: Virtual Private Cloud IP CIDR range

MgmtSubnetCidrBlock.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

Test1SubnetCidrBlock.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

Test2SubnetCidrBlock.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

IxClientInstanceType.Description: Instance type of Ixia Client VM

IxClientSSHKey.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access

VMoneInstanceType.Description: Instance type of VMONE Appliance VM

VMOne1Eth0PrivateIpAddress.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP Address of the form x.x.x.x
VMOne1Eth0PrivateIpAddress.Description: VMOne1 Eth0 Management Subnet IP Address

VMOne1Eth1PrivateIpAddresses.Description: VMOne1 Eth1 Test1 Subnet IP Address CSV list

VMOne2Eth0PrivateIpAddress.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x

VMOne2Eth1PrivateIpAddresses.Description: VMOne2 Eth1 Test2 Subnet IP Address CSV list

InboundIPv4CidrBlock.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
InboundIPv4CidrBlock.Description: IP Address /32 or IP CIDR range connecting inbound to Ixia Client
